name.Description: REQUIRED. Name of the electrode contact point.

x.Description: REQUIRED. X position. The positions of the center of each electrode in xyz space. Units are specified in space-<label>_coordsystem.json.

z.Description: REQUIRED. Z position. If electrodes are in 2D space this should be a column of n/a values.

size.Description: REQUIRED. Surface area of the electrode, units MUST be in mm^2.

seizure_zone.Description: final conclusion drawn by an epileptologist on the electrodes involved in the seizures

Levels.SOZ: Seizure Onset Zone, the region where the recorded clinical seizures originated during the recording period.
Levels.IrritativeZone: Region of cortex that generates interictal epileptiform discharges, but not seizures
Levels.EarlyPropagationZone: Region of cortex that generates the initial seizure symptoms. Not seizure onset, but the propagation of seizure from SOZ into this region within first 3 seconds from seizure onset.
Levels.Resected: Region of cortex that was resected
Levels.ResectedEdge: Region of cortex that is within 1 cm of the edge of the resected area.
